

# Stone

Set of tiles. 

```{python}

from tilingPuzzles.games.stone import Stone

```

## init Stone 

```{python}
tiles=[
    (1,2),
    (1,3),
    (2,3)
]

st=Stone(tiles)
st
```


## Visualize Stone 

```{python}
st.display()
```

## Symetries

```{python}
from tilingPuzzles.visualize.visualize import Visualize

vz=Visualize()

tiles=[
    (-1,2),
    (3,4),
    (5,-6)
]
 
st=Stone(tiles)

syms=st.get_symetries()

vz.update_stones(syms)

```

```{python}
! which python
```


## Normalize

```{python}
st.normalize()
```
